Payment Information

All eligible students participating in informal recruitment will be required to submit this fee prior to accepting a membership invitation. For questions, please use the "Contact Us" button.

Consent

I understand that by physically clicking on the Submit button on this page I am granting permission to the Student Activities Office at Southern Arkansas University to release the information contained herein to the relevant chapter officials of the Panhellenic Councils’ member or associate member chapters for recruitment purposes only. This action, though, does not require me to join a Greek society, nor does it obligate any Greek society to offer me membership. Should I join a Greek society, I also hereby grant permission to the Student Activities Office to release my semester and cumulative grades to the relevant chapter officials of the Greek society I join for as long as I am an active member.
